nodes.text: The Bright Jewel Oversector was an oversector of the galaxy which contained the moon Axxila III. During the Galactic Civil War the Galactic Empire's Bright Jewel Oversector Flight Base was located on Axxila III.

The Bright Jewel Oversector was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends novel Tatooine Ghost, which was written by Troy Denning and released in 2003. The region was confirmed to be canon when it appeared in the short story Last Call at the Zero Angle written by Jason Fry and published in Star Wars Insider 156 in 2015.
